name: FPS Russia: The Game
blurb: Use FPS Russia's arsenal of explosives to shoot, run, and shoot more in his first video game.

rewards.reward: No Reward
$10 in-game credit, FPS Russia stickers and a Kickstarter exclusive in-game weapon.
8x5 kickstarter exclusive poster, $10 in-game credit, FPS Russia stickers and a Kickstarter exclusive in-game weapon.
Exclusive digital art book of concept art, $15 in-game credit, FPS Russia stickers and Kickstarter exclusive in-game weapon.
FPS Russia dog tags, digital art book of concept art, $15 in-game credit, FPS Russia stickers and Kickstarter exclusive in-game weapon.

PAINTBALL PACK: hopper sticker pack, velcro FPS patch, Kickstarter exclusive access to in-game paintball guns, mask and vest. Also includes 8x5 kickstarter exclusive poster, $10 in-game credit and a Kickstarter exclusive in-game weapon.

DIGITAL PACK - Digital art book with high quality concept art, $25 in game credit, desktop and mobile wallpaper pack with hi-red poster and t-shirt designs, early access to the chicken gun and the kickstarter exclusive in-game weapon. This reward does not have any physical goods, it is ONLY DIGITAL.

The CHIVE PACK: TheCHIVE + FPS Russia EXCLUSIVE long sleeve black t-shirt, CHIVE + FPS poster, access to virtual Chive gun in game, $30 in game credit, your name listed as a CHIVER in the credits section off the game, FPS Russia dog tags, digital art book of concept art,  FPS Russia stickers, Kickstarter exclusive in-game weapon PLUS early access to the Chicken Gun.
FPS Russia t-shirt, FPS Russia dog tags, digital art book of concept art, $15 in-game credit, FPS Russia stickers and Kickstarter exclusive in-game weapon.

Your name will be in the credits of the game! Plus you'll get an FPS Russia t-shirt, FPS Russia dog tags, digital art book of concept art, $15 in-game credit, FPS Russia stickers and Kickstarter exclusive in-game weapon.

DIGITAL PACK + CREDITS. You get all the digital rewards plus your name in a special section of the credits. You get the digital art book with high quality concept art, $25 in game credit, desktop and mobile wallpaper pack with hi-res poster and t-shirt designs, early access to the chicken gun and the kickstarter exclusive in-game weapon. This reward does not have any physical goods, it is ONLY DIGITAL.

A Kickstarter exclusive game poster signed by FPS Russia, your name listed in a special credits section of the game, dog tags, digital art book of concept art, $15 in-game credit, FPS Russia stickers and Kickstarter exclusive in-game weapon PLUS early access to the Chicken Gun.

Get 2 t-shirts SIGNED by FPS Russia. You also get  2 dog tags, a signed game poster, your name listed in a special credits section of the game, digital art book of concept art, $20 in-game credit, FPS Russia stickers and Kickstarter exclusive in-game weapon.

A Kickstarter exclusive print map of the game,game poster signed by FPS Russia, your name listed in a special credits section of the game, dog tags, digital art book of concept art, $15 in-game credit, FPS Russia stickers and Kickstarter exclusive in-game weapon.

Early Access to the FPS Russia game - play it before it comes out! Also get a Kickstarter exclusive print map of the game, game poster signed by FPS Russia, your name listed in a special credits section of the game, dog tags, digital art book of concept art, $15 in-game credit, FPS Russia stickers and Kickstarter backers exclusive in-game weapon.\r\nNote: Shirt delivery in January, early access will be in December.

Customized 10 second audio clip from FPS Russia, signed game poster, your name listed in a special credits section of the game, print map, t-shirt, dog tags, digital art book of concept art, $20 in game credit, FPS Russia stickers and Kickstarter backers exclusive weapon.
Get the $200 package plus an extra 10-second audio clip and shirt for a friend.

Signed canvas of in-game art, 1 customized 10 second audio clips from FPS Russia, signed game poster, your name listed in a special credits section of the game, print map, t-shirt, dog tags, digital art book of concept art, $20 in game credit, FPS Russia stickers and Kickstarter backers exclusive weapon.

Your name will be listed as an Associate Producer in the credits of FPS Russia: The Game. Plus you'll get a signed canvas of in-game art, 1 customized 10 second audio clip from FPS Russia, signed game poster, print map, t-shirt, dog tags, digital art book of concept art, $100 in game credit, FPS Russia stickers, and Kickstarter backers exclusive weapon.

Custom 30 second private video from FPS Russia,  plus your name will be listed as an Associate Producer in the credits of the game. You'll also get a signed canvas of in-game art, signed game poster, print map, t-shirt, dog tags, digital art book of concept art, $100 in game credit, FPS Russia stickers and Kickstarter backers exclusive weapon.

Access on set for filming of an FPS Russia video for you and a friend, and your name will be listed as an Associate Producer in the credits of the game. You'll also get a signed canvas of in-game art, signed game poster, print map, t-shirt, dog tags, digital art book of concept art, $100 in game credit, FPS Russia stickers and Kickstarter backers exclusive weapon.

Be an enemy in the game! You'll receive digital artwork of yourself as a character, and be in the next update of the game. Plus your name will be listed as an Associate Producer in the credits of the game. You'll also get a signed canvas of in-game art, signed game poster, print map, t-shirt, dog tags, digital art book of concept art, $100 in game credit, FPS Russia stickers and Kickstarter backers exclusive weapon.\r\nNote: Your character may not appear until the first update of the game.

Spend a day at the range with FPS Russia for you and a friend. Also get your name listed as an Associate Producer in the credits of the game, a signed canvas of in-game art, 1 customized 10 second audio clip from FPS Russia, signed game poster, print map, t-shirt, dog tags, digital art book of concept art, $100 in game credit, FPS Russia stickers and Kickstarter backers exclusive weapon gun.\r\n***For higher reward tiers, look to the left under "Rewards"
